de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.io.manager

Class SimpleFileHandler<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.io.manager.SimpleFileHandler<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileHandler

    public class SimpleFileHandler<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Capable of reading and writing a file in a certain format.
    Author:
    Sebastian Krieter
    See Also:
    AFileManager

public static java.lang.String getFileName(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Retrieves the file name of a Path without its extension.
        Parameters:

        the file name

      • getFileExtension

        @Nonnull
public static java.lang.String getFileExtension(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Retrieves the file extension of a Path.
        Note: A dot at the first position of the file name is ignored. E.g., ".file" has no extension, but ".file.txt" would return "txt".
        Parameters:
        path - the given path
        Returns:
        the file extension
        See Also:
        getFileExtension(String)

      • getFileExtension

        @Nonnull
public static java.lang.String getFileExtension(java.lang.String fileName)
        Retrieves the file extension from a file name.
        Note: A dot at the first position of the file name is ignored. E.g., ".file" has no extension, but ".file.txt" would return "txt".
        Parameters:
        fileName - the given file name
        Returns:
        the file extension
        See Also:
        getFileExtension(Path)
